effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.colosseum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.emerald: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.colosseum: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.xd: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.
flavor_text.emerald: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user makes a fiery charge at the foe. It may cause a burn.
